name: tinyfeed
description: Tinyfeed is a self-hosted minimal RSS reader with focus on simplicity. It fetches feeds on a schedule and presents them in a clean, distraction-free web interface.
features: RSS aggregation: Subscribe to RSS and Atom feeds from blogs, news sites, and other sources.
Scheduled fetching: Automatically fetch new feed items on a configurable schedule without manual refreshes.
Clean interface: Read articles in a distraction-free interface focused on content consumption.
Feed management: Add, remove, and organize feeds with folders or categories for better organization.
Unread tracking: Track which articles you've read with automatic marking and manual controls.
Article filtering: Filter articles by feed, date, or read status to focus on relevant content.
Minimal design: Navigate a simple, lightweight interface that loads quickly and stays out of your way.
OPML import: Import feed subscriptions from other readers using standard OPML format.
Mobile-friendly: Read feeds on mobile devices with a responsive design optimized for small screens.
Privacy-focused: Fetch feeds server-side to avoid tracking and maintain privacy while reading.
Keyboard navigation: Navigate articles and feeds efficiently using keyboard shortcuts.
Lightweight deployment: Run with minimal server resources suitable for personal use or small groups.
